column4: how do i make a regular dvd, not a data dvd, with k3b, where one movie runs the whole length of the disc space of a 4.7 gib disc?
are trying to just burn a DVD or author one with a collection of video clips?
the Video DVD project is for files already properly formatted as a video DVD. If you pointed vlc or xine to the folder you have the files on now, would it behave like a DVD?
